param.name: coreapp
param.label: Core Application
param.description: Causes this application to not appear in the users applications list but it will allow this application to appear in the user profile automatically if selected.

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this plugin

param.name: position
param.label: Position
param.description: Default position if you select this as core apps

param.name: town_field_code
param.label: Town field code
param.description: The town field code. (default is FIELD_CITY)

param.name: state_field_code
param.label: State field code
param.description: The state field code. (default is FIELD_STATE)

param.name: country_field_code
param.label: Country field code
param.description: The country field code. (default is FIELD_COUNTRY)

param.name: count
param.label: Count
param.description: The number of friend to display (default is 0 no limit)

param.name: show_karma
param.label: Show karma / point
param.description: Select whether to show the karma or points
